title: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) System Development
goals: Develop a comprehensive ERP system with core business modules
Implement user authentication and role-based access control
Create intuitive web-based user interfaces for all modules
Establish automated testing and deployment pipelines
Ensure system security and data protection compliance
non_functional: Response time under 2 seconds for standard operations
Audit trail for all business transactions
risks: Complex integration requirements between modules may cause delays
Performance bottlenecks with large datasets need careful optimization
Security vulnerabilities in authentication system require thorough testing
Database migration complexity during development iterations
Third-party API dependencies may introduce stability issues

milestones.desc: Complete technical architecture and database design
Implement authentication system and core user management
Develop frontend components and backend APIs for main modules
Complete integration testing and performance optimization
Deploy production environment and conduct user acceptance testing
